title: Writing Linear Equations from Tables and Graphs
description: Students to write additive and multiplicative equations from tables and graphs at a 6th grade level with 9 pages (18 problems). Most of the problems are of the form y=kx or y=x+b with a few challenging questions at the end with 2 steps in the form y=mx+b. This product contains 9 pages (18 problems). The problems start easier and get progressively more difficult, including fractional slopes and y intercepts with decimals. Full Answer Key Included. The google doc is pictures of each problem (consisting of a table, graph, fill in the blank description, and equation) so you can delete or add an entire problem but you can't edit each one individually.
subject: Math
